pullrequest.title: Update depth and rgbd camera sensor to output point cloud data generated by ign-rendering DepthCamera

content.raw:
It looks like there's been a regression somewhere. The point cloud used to [look good](https://github.com/osrf/ros1_ign/pull/39) to me with the ROS 1 bridge, but now it's all over the place. Does it look good to you, @{557058:10b01d41-a2e9-4a41-a907-e6e2f03b6cd5} ?

![pt_cloud.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/da5rgr4/images/3114591110-pt_cloud.png)
content.html: It looks like there's been a regression somewhere. The point cloud used to look good to me with the ROS 1 bridge, but now it's all over the place. Does it look good to you, @Ian Chen ?
